Seven Minerals Organic and Pure Vitamin E Oil 1oz

Brand: Seven Minerals

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Vitamin E Oil (d-alpha-tocopherol)

Directions: Place 2–3 drops in the palm of your hand or directly on the desired application area. Test a small amount on your inner arm before applying it to your face.

.

Warnings: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If you are pregnant, consult your doctor before use. If irritation, redness or discomfort occurs, discontinue use.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
